entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow except periods of snow inland. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of snow inland early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
